subject: Investing
title: Creative Financing Strategies
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Creative Financing Strategies.

hook.text: An investor bought a $300,000 property with zero bank financing using seller carry-back terms.

buildup.text: Creative financing replaces or supplements traditional mortgages with flexible agreements.

discovery.text: Common tools include seller financing, lease options, and subject-to deals on existing mortgages.

twist.text: These strategies let you buy when banks say no, but they carry unique legal and default risks.

climax.text: A well-structured creative deal can outperform a conventional mortgage in both terms and speed.

punchline.text: When the bank says no, creative financing asks 'who else can say yes?'

quiz.question: What is seller carry-back financing?
options: The seller finances part of the purchase
